title: Episode #37: The Dangers of Psychotropic Medications (with Dr. Peter Breggin)
description:
What are psychotropic medications and why are they dangerous? In this episode I interview Dr. Peter Breggin, a Harvard trained psychiatrist, on psychotropic medications (anti-depressants, etc.), safe durg withdrawl, and alternative solutions. 
For more infomation on Dr. Peter Breggin, check out his site: https://breggin.com
Dr. Peter is a memebr of my Integrated Mind Network and will be a guest speaker at my 2018 conference: https://drleafconference.com
dc:creator: Dr. Caroline Leaf
